QuestData.Title: Hope Springs Eternal
QuestData.Description: The Shado-Pan are likely dealing with similar outbreaks elsewhere in Pandaria.$B$BSeek out Loon Mai, the Shado-Pan Watch Commander in Stoneplow on the western end of the Valley of the Four Winds. Let him know that we have the situation here under control; the Shado-Pan need not send any aid.$B$BQuite the opposite, in fact - I will be sending many of my followers on pilgrimage, to bring a message of hope to those in need.$B$BThank you again, $p. Farewell.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Loon Mai in Stoneplow.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Loon Mai in Stoneplow.
